  "description": "Brands Optimal Limited is one of Africa&rsquo;s leading Experiential Marketing Agency which optimizes value for client through the use of strategic, reliable and measurable method in consumer engagement, loyalty seeding and sales generation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Payable Officer

Job Location:Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type:Full-time
Industry: Experiential Marketing

Job Summary


	We are seeking a detail-oriented and highly organized Payable Officer to join our Finance team.


Responsibilities
The Payable Officer will be responsible for managing and validating all outgoing payments and financial obligations of the company, including:


	Verifying and confirming the accuracy, authenticity and completeness before all payment processing.
	Ensuring that all supporting documents (invoices, memos, approvals, vendor details, etc.) are correct and properly filed.
	Processing vendor payments, staff claims, reimbursements and other payables promptly.
	Maintaining an up-to-date record of all payables and ensuring timely settlement.
	Liaising with vendors, internal departments, and relevant stakeholders for confirmation of transactions.
	Reconciling payment records with bank statements and internal financial reports.
	Flagging discrepancies, errors or questionable transactions for further review.
	Supporting the Finance Department in audits, reporting, and administrative tasks.


Requirements and Skills


	HND / B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance or any related field with a minimum qualification of Upper Credit or Second Class Upper Division.
	2 - 4 years of experience as a payable officer.
	Proven experience in accounts payable or a similar finance role is an added advantage.
	Strong analytical and verification skills.
	Excellent attention to detail and high level of accuracy.
	Proficiency in MS Excel and basic accounting tools.
	Strong communication and documentation skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunities for career development and training
	A supportive and collaborative work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;

Payable Officer Job at Brands Optimal Limited




        
    

        
        Brands Optimal Limited is one of Africa’s leading Experiential Marketing Agency which optimizes value for client through the use of strategic, reliable and measurable method in consumer engagement, loyalty seeding and sales generation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Payable Officer

Job Location:Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type:Full-time
Industry: Experiential Marketing

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a detail-oriented and highly organized Payable Officer to join our Finance team.


Responsibilities
The Payable Officer will be responsible for managing and validating all outgoing payments and financial obligations of the company, including:


	Verifying and confirming the accuracy, authenticity and completeness before all payment processing.
	Ensuring that all supporting documents (invoices, memos, approvals, vendor details, etc.) are correct and properly filed.
	Processing vendor payments, staff claims, reimbursements and other payables promptly.
	Maintaining an up-to-date record of all payables and ensuring timely settlement.
	Liaising with vendors, internal departments, and relevant stakeholders for confirmation of transactions.
	Reconciling payment records with bank statements and internal financial reports.
	Flagging discrepancies, errors or questionable transactions for further review.
	Supporting the Finance Department in audits, reporting, and administrative tasks.


Requirements and Skills


	HND / B.Sc. in Accounting, Finance or any related field with a minimum qualification of Upper Credit or Second Class Upper Division.
	2 - 4 years of experience as a payable officer.
	Proven experience in accounts payable or a similar finance role is an added advantage.
	Strong analytical and verification skills.
	Excellent attention to detail and high level of accuracy.
	Proficiency in MS Excel and basic accounting tools.
	Strong communication and documentation skills.
	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits package
	Opportunities for career development and training
	A supportive and collaborative work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV / Resume to: jobs@brandsoptimal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

	Develop, review, and implement HR policies, procedures, and best practices aligned with organizational goals.
	Provide strategic guidance to management on workforce planning, employee relations, and organizational development.

	Manage HR records, HR systems, and reporting to support informed decision-making.
	Mentor and supervise HR team members, ensuring efficiency and continuous improvement within the HR function.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field (Master’s degree or HR certification is an added advantage).
	Proven experience in a senior HR role with people management responsibilities.
	Strong leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills.
	In-depth knowledge of labor laws, HR best practices, and HR software.
	Excellent problem-solving, decision-making, and conflict-management abilities.

  "title": "Operations / Project Manager",
  "description": "Master&ndash;sam Techcons Limited has been established as a manufacturing, installation, maintenance and repair, sales and training company.&nbsp;It carries out business activity in electrical/electronics repair, installation, supply and sales electrical and electronics devices, construction/building of circuits, domestic and industrial wiring services. It does solar and inverter installations, mobile phone repair, hardware and software maintenance and repair of PCs.

In educational sector, it carries out training programs and courses to groom individuals on electrical/electronics installation and repair such that after training, the individual can stand and start up a business on.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Operations / Project Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Asaba, Delta

Job Position: Customer Experience & Telesales Executive

	Qualification Specialist will be responsible for engaging with leads generated by our promotional venue team, conducting thorough needs assessment, and qualifying leads for further engagement with our sales team.
	The successful candidate will have excellent communication skills, a customer-centric approach, and a strong ability to uncover and understand clients' real estate needs.
	Make outbound calls to a list of leads and prospects
	Engage in conversations to introduce the products or services.
	Build up good product knowledge in order to be able to sell its features, benefits and value to prospective candidates.
	Collaborate closely with the sales & marketing team to understand lead sources, demographics, and engagement strategies.
	Strive to meet or exceed lead qualification targets while ensuring the highest level of customer satisfaction.
	We are looking for a proactive and dedicated Receivables and Telesales Officer to join our team and take charge of ensuring seamless collections from clients and recovering outstanding off-plan property payment.
	The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication and negotiation skills to handle clients effectively and maintain healthy financial standing for the organization.
	Develop and implement effective off-plan payment recovery strategies, tailored to the specific needs of clients and their payment history.
	Improvement: Proactively identify areas for process improvement to enhance collection efficiency and minimize potential bad debt exposure.


Requirements & Responsibilities


	Bachelor's Degree in Social, Business, Marketing, or a related field preferred.
	Minimum of at least 4 years in similar role in Insurance, Real estate, Finance firms.
	Proven experience in telesales, lead qualification, or similar customer-facing roles.
	Excellent verbal, organizational & communication skills with the ability to engage with attention to detail.
	Proven experience in collections, debt recovery, or a related financial field.
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills to engage with clients and resolve payment-related issues.
	Strong organizational proven abilities to manage multiple client accounts and follow-up activities effectively on telesales
	Analytical mindset to assess client payment behaviors and tailor recovery strategies accordingly.
	Proficiency in using financial software and MS Office applications for reporting and documentation.
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team environment.
	Result-oriented mindset with the ability to work toward targets and deadlines.
	Enthusiastic, self-motivated, and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment.

	Decision Making Skills, Negotiation Skills, Communication Skills, Analytical Skills, Resilient, Flexible, adaptable in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
